PACMAN_SPRITE_HEIGHT - Variable in class entity.PacmanEntity
The height of each PacmanSprite, and therefore, the entity itself.

The width of each PacmanSprite, and therefore, the entity itself.
PACMAN_SPRITES - Variable in class entity.PacmanEntity
The positions of the sprites in the master spritesheet that we'll use to draw Pacman.
PacmanEntity - Class in entity
The PacmanEntity handles the drawing, animations, collisions, pickups, etc of the player/pacman.
PacmanEntity(PacmanGame, Player, int, int) - Constructor for class entity.PacmanEntity
PacmanEntity constructor is responsible for initialising the super class, and requesting the pacman sprites from the SpriteController.
PacmanGame - Class in main
Base class for this pacman game; instantiates all core controllers, game engine, entity sprites and runs the main render loop.
PacmanGame() - Constructor for class main.PacmanGame
Private constructor as this class is a singleton and can only be initialised from inside this class
PacmanGame.STATE - Enum in main
The possible game states
pacmanSpawnPoint - Variable in class main.Map
The spawn point of the Pacman in this map; grid-based.

pacmanSprites - Variable in class fragment.MenuFragment
 
pacmanStateChange(PacmanEntity) - Method in class entity.ghost.GhostEntity
This function is called by the PacmanEntity when it's state has changed; this allows all the ghosts to re-evaluate their status (tracking or fleeing) based on a callback, rather than polling the entity for it's state every tick.
padding - Variable in class ui.Button
The amount of padding on all sides of the text

The PathFinder constructor
PathFinder.Node - Class in main
A inner class used to encapsulate information regarding the maps nodes, such as it's cost, position, and depth of path finding at the current moment of calculation.
pathfindingRoute - Variable in class entity.ghost.GhostEntity
